title: GAX Policy Expression Syntax Definition
description: Defines the canonical allowed operations, variables, and syntactic structure for complex expressions (formulas) used in fields like lower_bound_expr/upper_bound_expr within CRED definitions.

allowed_operators.description: Whitelist of mathematical/logical operators permitted in formulaic constraints (e.g., +, -, *, /, LOG, EXP, IF).

function_registry.description: Catalog of pre-approved runtime functions accessible within expressions.

reserved_keywords.description: Keywords reserved by the GAX state machine or expression evaluator that cannot be used as variable names.
